name: Relentless Rage
trigger: when you drop to 0 hit points while your Rage is active and do not die outright
effects: make a DC 10 Constitution saving throw; on success, your hit points become twice your Barbarian level
limits: each time you use this feature after the first, the DC increases by 5
the DC resets to 10 when you finish a short or long rest
